com.locuslabs.sdk.configuration

Class LocusLabs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.locuslabs.sdk.configuration.LocusLabs

  • public class LocusLabs
extends java.lang.Object
    LocusLabs is the principal entry point to the LocusLabs SDK; it must be initialized with a call to LocusLabs.initialize. Since initialization is asynchronous, it is possible to add an OnReadyListener that will not be called until the system is initialized.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LocusLabs.OnReadyListener
      Interface to have an action take place only after LocusLabs has been initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • registerOnReadyListener

        public static void registerOnReadyListener(LocusLabs.OnReadyListener onReadyListener)
        Register a listener that will called once LocusLabs SDK has been initialized If the system is *already* initialized the listener's onReady will be called immediately.
        Parameters:
        onReadyListener - the method to call when the LocusLabs SDK has finished initialized.

      • isBluetoothPermitted

        public boolean isBluetoothPermitted()
        Has the application requested the Bluetooth permissions we need in order to detect beacons?

      • setLogLevel

        public static void setLogLevel(long logLevel)
        Sets the logging level. Can be called before initialize(Context) to ensure logging level is set before initialization.
        Parameters:
        logLevel - desire log level; valid values: LogLevelUnknown LogLevelError LogLevelWarn LogLevelInfo LogLevelDebug LogLevelTrace

      • getLogLevel

        public static long getLogLevel()
        Returns the log level
        Returns:
        log level

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Initializes the LocusLabs Android SDK. If you call setLogLevel(long) before calling initialize(), then you can override the default logging level which is LogLevelWarn.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext -

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context applicationContext,
                              java.lang.String accountId)
        Initialize the LocusLabs SDK
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the Android applicationContext for the current application
        accountId - the customer's accountId

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context applicationContext,
                              java.lang.String accountId,
                              LocusLabs.OnReadyListener onReadyListener)
        Initialize the LocusLabs SDK, passing in a listener to be called when the SDK is initialized
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the Android applicationContext for the current application
        accountId - the customer's accountId
        onReadyListener - the listener to be called later

      • purgeSharedPreferences

        public static void purgeSharedPreferences(android.content.Context applicationContext)

        Release so that initialize(Context) can be called again
